languages.text: Главный кормчий Равор, истекая кровью из сотен ран, повел судно на таран зловещей гробницы. Сокрушительный удар расколол зловещую могилу ксеносов, но даже он не мог повергнуть К'тан.
Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.
languages.original_text: Главный кормчий Равор, истекая кровью из сотен ран, повел судно на таран зловещей гробницы. Сокрушительный удар расколол зловещую могилу ксеносов, но даже он не мог повергнуть К'тан.

traits.locale_text: Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the ominous xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat C'tan.
Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the ominous xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat C'tan.
Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.
Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.
Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.

languages.text: 舵手长雷沃浑身上下受了几百处伤，他不顾浑身的鲜血，指挥飞船朝邪恶的异形墓穴猛撞过去。舰船的撞击造成了毁灭性的打击，邪恶的异形建筑被撞得四分五裂。但即便如此，也不足以击溃星神。
languages.original_text: Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.

traits.locale_text: 舵手长雷沃浑身上下受了几百处伤，他不顾浑身的鲜血，指挥飞船朝邪恶的异形墓穴猛撞过去。舰船的撞击造成了毁灭性的打击，邪恶的异形建筑被撞得四分五裂。但即便如此，也不足以击溃星神。

languages.text: 何百という傷から血を流し、マスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアは不気味な墓所へ船を率いて盛大に突っ込んだ。壊滅的な衝撃が不吉な異種族の大建造物をバラバラに倒壊させたが、それですらク＝タンを打ち倒すには足りなかった。
languages.original_text: Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.

traits.locale_text: 何百という傷から血を流し、マスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアは不気味な墓所へ船を率いて盛大に突っ込んだ。壊滅的な衝撃が不吉な異種族の大建造物をバラバラに倒壊させたが、それですらク＝タンを打ち倒すには足りなかった。

languages.text: Malgré ses centaines de plaies ouvertes, le maître timonier Ravor propulsa le vaisseau contre l'inquiétant tombeau. Un coup puissant éventra le sinistre édifice xénos, mais cela ne suffit pas à vaincre les C'tans.
languages.original_text: Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.

traits.locale_text: Malgré ses centaines de plaies ouvertes, le maître timonier Ravor propulsa le vaisseau contre l'inquiétant tombeau. Un coup puissant éventra le sinistre édifice xénos, mais cela ne suffit pas à vaincre les C'tans.

languages.text: Aun sangrando por cientos de heridas, el maestro timonel Ravor estrelló la nave contra la tétrica tumba. Un poderoso impacto partió la siniestra construcción xenos, pero ni siquiera eso bastó para derrotar al C'tan.
languages.original_text: Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.

traits.locale_text: Aun sangrando por cientos de heridas, el maestro timonel Ravor estrelló la nave contra la tétrica tumba. Un poderoso impacto partió la siniestra construcción xenos, pero ni siquiera eso bastó para derrotar al C'tan.

languages.text: Hauptsteuermann Ravor blutete aus hundert Wunden und rammte mit dem Schiff das unheimliche Grab. Die Kollision zerteilte das böse Xenos-Gebäude, aber selbst das reichte nicht aus, um den C'tan zu besiegen.
languages.original_text: Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.

traits.locale_text: Hauptsteuermann Ravor blutete aus hundert Wunden und rammte mit dem Schiff das unheimliche Grab. Die Kollision zerteilte das böse Xenos-Gebäude, aber selbst das reichte nicht aus, um den C'tan zu besiegen.

languages.text: Aldığı yüzlerce yaradan kanlar akan Başserdümen Ravor, geminin kontrolünü alıp onu meşum kabre çarptı. Bu büyük darbe, uğursuz zenonun mabedini yarsa da bu bile C'tan'ı yok etmeye yetmedi.
languages.original_text: Bleeding from hundreds of wounds, Master Helmsman Ravor led the ship to ram the ominous tomb. A crushing blow split the sinister xenos edifice, but even that was not enough to defeat the C'tan.

traits.locale_text: Aldığı yüzlerce yaradan kanlar akan Başserdümen Ravor, geminin kontrolünü alıp onu meşum kabre çarptı. Bu büyük darbe uğursuz zenonun mabedini yardı ancak bu bile C'tan'ı yok etmek için yeterli olmadı.
